column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We always order the mashed potatoes and have ordered it with either brussel sprouts or elote
column2: both are good. For apps we've tried the shrimp de jhong which was okay and the peppered duck and goat cheese
column3: which I preferred. For an app
column6: two drinks and a nice bottle of cab/franc
column7: dinner comes to about $300 with tax and tip. Which is pricey but pretty standard for a high end steakhouse.
